Discrete Mathematics

Proposition Satisfiability

DM
Feb 10, 2020

Solution

DM
Feb 9, 2020

Set of Truth Value that make a Compound Propositions Satifiable.

Unsatisfiable

DM
Feb 8, 2020

A Compound Propositions is unsatifiable is there is no set of Truth Value for which it is true.

Satifiable

DM
Feb 7, 2020

A Compound Propositions is satifiable if there is a set of Truth Value of its variables that makes it true.

Propositional Equivalences

DM
Feb 6, 2020

Laws defined over compound propositions

DM
Feb 5, 2020

Logical Equivalence

DM
Feb 4, 2020

Compound Propositions that are always equal for all Truth Value. It is denoted as $p \equiv q$.

Contingency

DM
Feb 3, 2020

A Compound Propositions that is neither Tautology nor Contradiction.

Contradiction

DM
Feb 2, 2020

A Compound Propositions that is always false irrespective of its constituent Proposition.

Tautology

DM
Feb 1, 2020

A Compound Propositions that is always true irrespective of the Truth Value of its constituent Proposition.

AND Gate

DM
Jan 31, 2020

Takes two inputs and performs Conjunction.

OR Gate

DM
Jan 30, 2020

Takes two inputs and performs Disjunction.
